ygData.subject: Heritrix "hangs" and doesn't finish its job
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone here at archive-crawler, I m experiencing a strange problem with my crawler (heritrix cvs + AddRedirectFromRootServerToScope fix from Gordon). It

Hi everyone here at archive-crawler,

I'm experiencing a strange problem wi=
th my crawler (heritrix cvs +
AddRedirectFromRootServerToScope fix from Gor=
don). It happened to me
twice so far.

After about 1 hour it has fetched (a=
llmost?) all the documents it is
supposed to (about 9000 seeds and a limit =
of 100 documents per host)
and then just "hangs".

The Frontier Report tell=
s me:

 -----=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D STATS =3D=3D=3D=3D=3D-----
 Discovered:    100=
8968
 Queued:        24

  Fai=
led:       1565
  Disregarded:  4570

=3D=3D=3D-----

               pending: =
    0

 All class queues map size: 12872
             Active queues: 0
    =
                In-process: 0
                         Ready: 0
           =
            Snoozed: 0
           Inactive queues: 0
            Retired qu=
eues: 2226
          Exhausted queues: 10646

 -----=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D IN-PROC=
ESS QUEUES =3D=3D=3D=3D=3D-----

So there are still 24 queued URIs - but no=
 active queue left (last
time a queue did anything was about 12 hours ago).=


There is nothing in the runtime-errors.log.

e this:
